snippet.title: PLANET IX - Official Trailer | Explore, Build, and Survive on Lunara!
snippet.description:
Welcome to PLANET IX!

Check out the official trailer for PLANET IX, an exciting 2D top-down open-world game set on Lunara, a mysterious twin planet of Earth. After a cataclysmic event on our home planet, you'll help build and manage a safe colony for the last survivors with the aid of AI GP.To.

Watch the trailer to get a glimpse of the game’s stunning pixel art, unique gameplay features, and various systems you'll experience, including crafting, exploration, combat, and construction.

Add PLANET IX to your wishlist and stay updated: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3124860/PLANET_IX/

Thank you for your support! 🚀✨
